alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 2:24AM CST until January 22 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one quarter inch. * WHERE: Portions of northern Arkansas. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Monday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions.
